title: A great way to kick off April fools
body:
Imagine if Riot switched up the soundfiles so that champ voices are mixed up like for example darius says veigars quotes in a veigar voice and lux has darius sound files and yasuo lux soundfiles and so on.
Edit: Baron the size of teemo is a great idea level one pentakill or maybe they can deepen characters with high voice and make character with low voices high. Nasus will be so funny.
